courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: EPSY 236; admission to the Early Childhood Teacher Education Program. Concurrent enrollment in CI 420.
description: Basic principles, techniques, and materials for the emergent literacy classroom. Emphasizes linguistic and cultural factors in culturally diverse settings. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: EPSY 236; admission to the Early Childhood Teacher Education Program. Concurrent enrollment in CI 420.
label: Lang Literacy in EC Educ I
sectionCappArea: Restricted to Admitted Teacher Ed Student students.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Early Childhood Education or Early Childhood Education major(s) or minor(s).
